page.title: 15Little Addington Greens
page.content: In 1975,the occupants of the drive decided to look after this land-rather than leave the land derelict.The land has,during the last 10 years,become to be considered as "The Village Green" it is now a large expanse of grass, with trees paid for and planted by the residents of the drive,and the grass cut by the residents of the drive and the Parish Council.The owners of this land are the family who sold the remainder of Dovecote Drive land to house developers,and who own several properties in the village,and a lot of acres to the south of the village.A bungalow,Arnage,adjacent to the green was purchased by this family in October 1984.Without futher occupation,this property together with the green were offered for sale.There is therefore a high likelihood that the character of the village is about to change.
